Pesticide use and safety

The WHO has indicated there are as many as 20,000 unintentional pesticide poisoning deaths per year. Learn the dangers and how to use agrochemicals more safely.

5-part Pesticide Use and Safety course

Pesticide Training Course UC Davis, Defining Pests. Part 1 of 5 from UC Davis

Pesticide Training Course UC Davis, Defining Pesticides. Part 2 of 5 from UC Davis

Pesticide Training Course UC Davis, Do I need to spray?. Part 3 of 5 from UC Davis

Pesticide Training Course UC Davis, About Spray Equipment?. Part 4 of 5 from UC Davis

Pesticide Training Course UC Davis, Safety. Part 5 of 5 from UC Davis
